column4: I wonder if anyone else is having issued with http://www.beerorkid.com dapper/main Packages repos tonight?

I am going back to XP, the repositories are broke tonight for Compiz, to bad.
Too bad :/
If i show you my gnome desktop you will think i am running osx panther.
did u follow that guide of digg?
Def not, that was by far the lamest guide, half broke too.
well it worked fine for me up until the part about getting a dock
I just started looking at gnome art and gnome look and picked the best match and combined it with Compiz t-ish theme and OSX actual wallpaper + gdesklet botton icon theme.
oh ur runnig compiz, im on metacity
